Description: The fine item you are considering is a Jerry Jones Guitars Electric Sitar Guitar Coral Reproduction. This super cool, high quality Electric Sitar from Jerry Jones Guitars comes with everything you see pictured, including the original hang tag, tuning rod and case. The guitar, case and accessories are all in exceptionally well cared for condition, showing only a very few minor marks that you’d have to search for, in fact, although it has been used, I wouldn’t be surprised to see Guitar Center selling a guitar in this condition as “new”. The only issue I can find with the guitar is that it looks like there was originally a plastic pick-guard type piece that was installed over the sitar section to prevent the player’s arm from resting on those strings. That piece was removed by a previous owner and I do not have that piece. I’m guessing that the previous owner wanted access to actually play the sitar section so he/she removed the plate, but whatever the case, the plate is no longer with the guitar. Oh, forgot to mention that a few of the control pots are a little "scratchy" when turned, but this is typical and nothing that couldn't be cured by an internal cleaning with something like Caig's DeOxit. Please see my photos to have a look at this nice item. Winning bidder/buyer pays $58.00 shipping and insurance in the contiguous U.S., plus $5.00 for packing materials (bubble wrap) with shipping to Alaska and Hawaii most likely costing more (if you are in Alaska or Hawaii, please contact me for a shipping estimate). Foreign bidders/buyers pay costs as per eBay's Global Shipping Program. We now accept PayPal. Due to the large amount of items I now auction, I can unfortunately no longer allow in person pick up of items. My return policy is that returns are only accepted if I made a mistake in the listing, not disclosing a serious issue with the item, in other words, if the item is substantively different than as described in my listing.Thanks for looking, and happy bidding/buying!
Title: Jerry Jones Guitars Electric Sitar Guitar Coral Reproduction
